name: submitter
description: submits Bitcoin block headers to the BtcMirror contract

scripts.submit-xdai:
while true; do ETH_RPC_URL=https://rpc.xdaichain.com npm start -- 0x24e7091d7e01750f467d4272839acb6b5404dac5; echo '

SLEEPING FOR 60s...

' && sleep 60; done
scripts.submit-opt:
while true; do ETH_RPC_URL=https://opt-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/UIWZJo9n_JabdfySOspT_ZwZfExy8UUs npm start -- 0x69ee459ca98cbdecf9156b041ee1621513aef0c6; echo '

SLEEPING FOR 60s...

' && sleep 60; done
scripts.submit-zksync:
while true; do ETH_RPC_URL=https://zksync2-testnet.zksync.dev npm start -- 0x8f562B0ADd56A9FaCd9E42A51D874BA17f616B27; echo '

SLEEPING FOR 30s...

' && sleep 30; done
